thread.title: Israel PM backs pardon for soldier
thread.title_full: Israel PM backs pardon for soldier

title: Israel PM backs pardon for soldier
text:
Israel PM backs pardon for soldier 4 January 2017 Close share panel Israeli PM Netanyahu calls for pardon of soldier convicted of manslaughter for the killing of wounded Palestinian
